total_revenue.context: June quarter revenue record, up 1% year-over-year

segments.name: iPhone

revenue.context: Revenue down 12% year-over-year, improvement from Q2's 17% decline

key_points: Significant improvement from Q2's 17% decline
Return to growth in retail and online stores in June
Record active installed base
Growth in all top 20 markets
99% customer satisfaction for iPhone XR, XS and XS Max
83% of business buyers plan to purchase iPhones
Strong response to trade-in and financing programs

segments.name: Services

revenue.context: All-time record revenue, up 13% year-over-year (15% excluding one-time item)

key_points: Over 420 million paid subscriptions
Records for AppleCare, Music, Cloud Services
App Store search ad business at record high
Double-digit growth in all geographic segments
Services account for 21% of revenue and 36% of gross margin
Apple TV app viewers up 40% year-over-year in US
Apple Pay reaching 1 billion transactions per month

segments.name: Mac
key_points: Growth in 4 of 5 geographic segments
June quarter records in US, Europe and Japan
Nearly half of purchases from new-to-Mac customers
Record active installed base
Outpaced global PC industry
Launched new MacBook Air and Pro
Announced Mac Pro and Pro Display XDR

segments.name: iPad
key_points: Growth in all 5 geographic segments
Q3 revenue record in Mainland China
Over half of purchases from new-to-iPad customers
Record active installed base
94% customer satisfaction rating
75% of business buyers plan to purchase iPads
Third consecutive quarter of growth

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories
key_points: Wearables growth over 50%
Now size of a Fortune 200 company
75% of Apple Watch buyers were first-time purchasers
Strong AirPods demand
Double-digit growth in Apple TV and accessories
Growth across all geographic segments

strategic_initiatives: Launch of iOS 13, iPadOS, tvOS 13, watchOS 6
Expansion of ECG app to more countries
Introduction of Mac Catalyst for iOS apps on Mac
New AR technologies: ARKit 3, RealityKit, Reality Composer
Expansion of authorized service provider network
Apple Card launch planned for August

market_opportunities.services: Growing paid subscriptions towards 500 million goal in 2020

market_opportunities.financial_services: 90 of top 100 banks deploying Apple products

market_opportunities.augmented_reality: World's largest AR-enabled platform with new developer tools

introduction: Return to growth with June quarter revenue record of $53.8 billion
Return to growth in Mainland China
services: Apple TV app viewers up 40% year-over-year in US
Apple Pay reaching 1 billion transactions monthly
products: iPhone return to growth in retail/online stores in June
Wearables now bigger than 60% of Fortune 500
Strong iPad growth driven by iPad Pro
Mac growth fueled by MacBook Air and Pro
Announced Mac Pro and Pro Display XDR

introduction: June quarter revenue record of $53.8 billion
Growth despite 300 basis point FX impact
Growth in all geographic segments in constant currency
